articles.title: DPRK Rejects UN "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
DPRK Rejects UN "Human Rights Resolution"
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Wednesday as regards the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" that was adopted at the third committee of the 67th UN General Assembly:
					The EU and Japan played key roles in fabricating the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution". The resolution peppered with stereo-typed lies and false stories does not deserve even a passing note as it is a politically-motivated one aimed at serving the purposes of the hostile forces.
					
					The Western forces are blindly following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK out of inveterate repugnance toward its socialist system. Every year they resort to absurd political chicanery to play down the daily increasing international prestige of the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. and its allies are styling themselves a "human rights judge" whom no one recognize and resorting to despicable acts to slander independent nations and maintain the old international order of domination and subjugation. This, however, only touches off censure and derision of the world progressives.
					
					The DPRK flatly rejects and vehemently denounces the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" which the hostile forces adopted to bring down the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses by abusing the noble idea of human rights, prompted by their sinister political purposes.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian Delegation
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Ministry of Justice of Mongolia headed by Minister Temuujin Khishigdemberel which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday. 
					The head of the delegation said he saw during his sojourn the Korean people achieving big success in various fields under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					He expressed the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Justice of Mongolia headed by Minister Temuujin Khishigdemberel visited Mangyongdae, birth place of President Kim Il Sung, on Wednesday.
					The members of the delegation went round historic relics preserved there with much care, being briefed on the undying revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung and the patriotic and revolutionary family members of Mangyongdae.
					
					The head of the delegation said:
					
					Kim Il Sung devoted his all to the country and its people. The feats he performed for the prosperity of the country and the cause of reunification will shine long.
					
					The delegation visited Kim Jong Il University of People's Security.
					
					The guests laid a bouquet before the statue of Kim Il Sung at the university before paying tribute to him.
					
					Then they went round the indoor firing training ground and other places of the university.
					
					The head of the delegation said that he marveled at the high education level of the university, a base for training defenders of the people, expressing the belief that the work for people's security will be successfully conducted in the DPRK in the future, too.
					
					The delegation toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph, Museum of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, etc.

articles.title: Greetings to Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Palestinian President
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on the day of international solidarity with the Palestinian people.
					Kim in the message said that Israel's ceaseless moves to build settlements and racist crackdown upon the Palestinian people have become a main obstacle in achieving fair and lasting peace in the Mideast.
					
					He reaffirmed the DPRK's consistent support and solidarity with the Palestinian people in their just cause to retake the right to found an independent state and other legitimate national rights, and wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Sierra Leon
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Sierra Leon
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Ernest Bai Koroma on his reassumption of office as the president. 
					In the message Kim wished the president of Sierra Leon greater successes in the work for stability of the country and socio-economic development as well as happiness in good health, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: Greetings to Albanian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Albanian President
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Albanian President Bujar Nishani on the occasion of its national day.
					Kim in the message wished the president success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Arrives
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan led by Chairperson Kim Hwa Hyo arrived here on Wednesday to participate in the celebrations for the 60th anniversary of the Academy of Social Sciences.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting Marks Day of International Solidarity with Palestinian People
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting Marks Day of International Solidarity with Palestinian People
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting with staff members of the Palestinian embassy here took place at the Changgwang Kindergarten on Wednesday to mark the day of the international solidarity with the Palestinian people.
					Present there on invitation were Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan and his embassy officials.
					
					On hand were Ko Myong Hun, vice-chairman of the DPRK-Palestine Friendship and Solidarity Committee, officials concerned and teachers of the kindergarten.
					
					The participants looked round various places of the kindergarten that was built wonderfully thanks to the deep love of the peerlessly great persons for the rising generations.
					
					Then, they enjoyed an art performance given by children of the kindergarten and talked with each other, deepening friendly feelings.

articles.title: Kim Hyong Jik University of Education Develops Many Software
articles.content:
Kim Hyong Jik University of Education Develops Many Software
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyong Jik University of Education has developed a lot of software and applied them to education.
					The university developed a number of software including the program for supporting teaching and studying, the program for simulated experiment and practice and the program for tele-education, thereby promoting the work to put the education system and method on a scientific basis.
					
					Teachers and researchers of the university developed new-type programs helpful to making students study and deeply grasp the immortal revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. They also succeeded in studying the system for supporting the tele-education in close contact with different universities and scientific and research institutions and have used it in education.
					
					They developed software for studying English grammars conducive to the deep learning of foreign languages' grammars, one for judging possession of English vocabulary in objective and scientific manner, one for reciting English which helps students hear English texts of standard pronunciation, etc.
					
					Among the software developed by them are one for supporting the study of fast reading and one for managing all businesses in library.
					
					They also succeeded in making valuable programs including system for supporting the tele-education in science of finance, system for supporting the tele-education in calisthenics, system for auto-test, system for the physical simulated experiment through remote control, system for the simulated experiment of biochemistry and system for assessing analytics.
					
					Dozens of programs developed by the university were highly appreciated at the 13th national program exhibition in the educational field and the 23rd national program contest and exhibition held this year.

articles.title: Nanotechnology-based Air Purifier Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Nanotechnology-based Air Purifier Developed in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The Integrated Circuit Institute of the DPRK State Academy of Sciences has developed a small air purifier based on oxidizability by nano combined photocatalyst.
					This photocatalyst makes it possible to keep indoor air sterilized by natural energy and renews itself automatically during its activity. 
					
					The purifier, with a function of generating anion, is very effective in trapping various harmful substances and dust and is highly germicidal.
					
					Yun Sang Chol, chief of the Environment Research Room of the Institute, told KCNA:
					
					"The newly-developed purifier helps decompose and eliminate benzene, ammonia, hydrogen sulfide, sulfurous acid gas, carbon dioxide and other air pollutants.
					
					In particular it can decontaminate pollutants of high concentration without using some reagents.
					
					This device, which costs low and consumes less electricity, is now paying off at hospitals, worksites, harmful gas-generating sites, houses, office rooms and others."

articles.title: Scientific, Technological Innovations Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific, Technological Innovations Made in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Scientists, technicians and workers of the DPRK is positively conducive to building an economic power by vividly waging scientific research work and popular technical innovation.
					Scientists of the institute of control instruments invented and introduced various highly efficient and handy control devices, thus raising the level of the modernization of large-scale machine tools.
					
					The mechanical engineering institute developed an oxygen generator for medical treatment, making a reasonable method to fully produce and provide high purity oxygen for contributing to the treatment.
					
					The branch institute of railway science increased the usage of new brakes for passenger and freight trains than ever.
					
					Teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology invented new technologies such as a method of making insecticide and its use and a method of making photo catalyst coating liquid for air-conditioning. They are drawing interests for their high practical values in improving the works for forestation and hygienic environment.
					
					Inventions have been made in construction sites of dwelling houses in Pyongyang.
					
					Lots of technical innovation proposals were applied to ensure the speed and quality in bedding and structuring skyscraping buildings and constructing public buildings and improve construction of elevators and heating system and the greening.
					
					The Taean Heavy Machine Complex, the February 8 Vinalon Complex, the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and other units made technological innovations of high practical values, contributing to increased production.

articles.title: People of DPRK Strive to Better Residential Quarters
articles.content:
People of DPRK Strive to Better Residential Quarters
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Tongsin County of Jagang Province in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has taken on a new look after recovering from a serious typhoon and flood damage.
					In summer the country was hard hit by torrential rainfalls and typhoons, which affected this county, too, leaving many dwelling houses submerged or destroyed and roads and bridges broken.
					
					However, the inhabitants in the county removed all traces of the damage in three months and turned their villages into better places.
					
					They built hundreds of dwelling houses and improved rivers and streams. And they established pleasure parks and grounds equipped with modern facilities to suit its local characteristics, bringing about a radical change in land management.
					
					Kim Chong Song, secretary of the Tongsin County People's Committee, told KCNA:
					
					"The county plans to renovate its house of culture and library on a modern basis and build a health complex.
					
					Its officials and inhabitants are now filled with the patriotic will to turn the county into a better living place."

articles.title: Vol. 2 of "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Off Press
articles.content:
Vol. 2 of "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Off Press
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Vol. 2 of "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" was brought out by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House.
					It is a library of the immortal Juche idea, Songun idea which systematically and comprehensively deals with famous works of leader Kim Jong Il in a chronological order.
					
					The book contains 114 works including historic speeches, conclusions and talks made by him from August 1960 to April 1961.
					
					The works indicate ideas, theories and policies related to realizing
					
					Korean revolution, socialist construction, country's reunification and the cause of global independence he clarified with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities in the first days of providing the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					
					His works "Kim Il Sung University Is the University of the Leader Both in Name and Reality" and "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee" clarify the mission and duty of Kim Il Sung University and express unshakable will to become the master with responsibilities for the Korean revolution and uphold the cause of the leader generation after generation.
					
					"'Let Us Devotedly Defend the Party Central Committee Headed by the Respected Comrade Kim Il Sung!', The People's Army Should Advance Upholding This Slogan", "Immortal Life of Revolutionary Lies in Boundless Loyalty to the Leader" and other works expound the idea that devotedly defending the party and the leader serves as a decisive guarantee for the victory of the Korean revolution.
					
					Works "On Having Proper Understanding of Revolutionary Traditions", "Portraying the Leader Is an Important Task Facing the Field of Revolutionary Literature and Art" specify principled issues arising in fully preserving the revolutionary traditions of Juche and depicting the greatness of leaders.
					
					The works indicate the idea for the students to prepare themselves to be talents with wide and deep knowledge of the fields they are majoring in, the issue for them to train themselves to be aware of the reality and use the knowledge they learnt in it through the socio-political activities and others.
					
					The book also contains works dealing with the idea of studying the theoretical issues of political economy based on the historical facts and actual conditions of Korea, the inevitability of the collapse of the colonial system of imperialism and tasks and ways arising in the anti-U.S. struggle of the south Korean people.

articles.title: ACNA Commentary Rebukes Chairman of U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff for Fanning Up War Fever in DMZ
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Rebukes Chairman of U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff for Fanning Up War Fever in DMZ
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff recently toured the demilitarized zone (DMZ) together with the U.S. forces commander in south Korea. They "encouraged" south Korean soldiers and talked about "sustained contribution to the defence of south Korea."
					This is a vivid indication of the U.S. invariable hostile policy toward the DPRK and its intention for its permanent military presence in south Korea.
					
					The U.S. has openly disclosed its hostile policy toward the DPRK in many aspects.
					
					During the presidential campaign the U.S. chief executive found fault with the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence and blustered that the DPRK will have to pay a price.
					
					Timed to coincide with this, diplomatic and military authorities visited several countries and heated discussion on stepping up pressure on the DPRK while crying out for "complete, verifiable and irreversible denuclearization" and the implementation of the UN Security Council's resolution on the DPRK.
					
					Now under way in Washington and Seoul are confabs to reach an agreement on joint provocative counteractions to fight a war against the DPRK. It is against this backdrop that the top U.S. military officials came out to DMZ where huge troops are standing in acute showdown and revealed the design for the U.S. forces' permanent presence in south Korea under the pretext of "defense". This can never be overlooked.
					
					The U.S. forces in south Korea are aggression troops and means for provoking a war against the DPRK, containing big powers and establishing domination over the region.
					
					They constitute a cancer-like entity which turned the Korean Peninsula into the world's biggest hotspot and has posed grave threats to peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					As long as the U.S. forces remain in south Korea, the U.S. has no justification to say that it has no hostile intent toward the DPRK and no one will believe in it.
					
					All facts clearly prove that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK remains unchanged and has been stepped up instead.
					
					The U.S. criminal intention is to keep its forces, leftover of the Cold War era, in south Korea and intensify military rule and domination over south Korea by relying on them and keep pursuing hostile policy toward the DPRK. With nothing can it justify those moves.
					
					If the U.S. honestly wishes for the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and has intent to withdraw its hostile policy toward the DPRK, it should pull its forces out of south Korea without delay.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Evading Responsibility for Suspended Tour of Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Evading Responsibility for Suspended Tour of Mt. Kumgang
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the south Korean "Ministry of Unification" recently talked nonsense that "the north should show sincerity to the talks between the authorities of the south and the north" for the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of its start. He called for "modifying the agreement on providing a guarantee for the safety of tourists."
					Minju Joson Wednesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This is no more than a folly to shift the blame for the failure of the resumption of the suspended tour of Mt. Kumgang on to the DPRK.
					
					Citing facts to prove the puppet forces are a main culprit that scotched the tour, the commentary goes on:
					
					The DPRK proposed the south side more than once to hold talks for the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					However, the south Korean conservative group deliberately shunned the proposal, derailing working-level contact.
					
					The group is paying lip-service to the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang though it suspended the tour under absurd pretext out of its stand of persistent opposition to the tour. Lurking behind this is its sinister intention.
					
					There are under way in south Korea strong actions to punish those chiefly responsible for the deteriorated north-south relations with the approach of "presidential election."
					
					South Koreans are becoming increasingly assertive in their voices calling for resuming the tour of Mt. Kumgang on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of its start.
					
					This is why the puppet conservative group is pretending to be interested in the issue of the tour by taking issue with the DPRK in a bid to cover up its crimes of having plunged the inter-Korean relations into deadlock and calm down the south Koreans' demand for the resumption of the tour.
					
					With no rhetoric can the conservative group evade the legal responsibility for having suspended the tour of Mt. Kumgang and pushed the north-south ties to the lowest ebb, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: Japan Can Never Evade Its Past Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Can Never Evade Its Past Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Japanese authorities let loose a spate of outbursts one after another that there is lack of facts and evidence related to the issue of sexual slavery committed by the Imperial Japanese Army and that they hope for the presentation of more evidence, if any.
					The Japanese authorities are working hard to deny and justify the past crimes, a clear proof that they still harbor the idea of committing such crimes again.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					Japan's settlement of its past crimes is the state responsibility and political and moral duty that can not be evaded in the light of international law and from the ethical and moral viewpoints.
					
					Several countries which committed war crimes in the past expressed deep apology and repentance for their wrongdoings several times after the war and have taken phased steps to make reparation for the victimized countries and individual victims.
					
					This being a hard fact, only Japan has refused to admit the historical facts of aggression and crimes until today though more than half a century has passed since the defeat of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					The Japanese militarists' wrong attitude reflects their criminal scenario to inflict the horrible holocaust of a war on humankind.
					
					The Japanese authorities should lend an ear to the international voices of protest and denunciation.
					
					If they continue to resort to vicious and impudent moves and mock at the international community, they will meet greater international rebuff and criticism.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservatives Denounced for Talking about "North's Interference in Presidential Election"
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservatives Denounced for Talking about "North's Interference in Presidential Election"
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative group is vociferating about the "north's interference in presidential election" with the approach of the election in south Korea. 
					The story about the "north's interference" is a sheer lie aimed to deceive and mock at the south Korean people, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined commentary. 
					
					The commentary goes on:
					
					The DPRK is not concerned about who becomes "president" in south Korea. 
					
					But what is intolerable is the fact that the south Korean ruling quarters hurt the north-south relations and mock at the destiny of the nation while standing against the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					
					What the DPRK is concerned about is not who will be the "president-elect" but whether he or she intends to improve the inter-Korean ties. This is the deserved right of the DPRK as the main force responsible for the north-south relations. 
					
					To describe it as "interference" is a false charge of persecution maniacs. 
					
					Moreover, the south Korean group of conservatives tries to attain its sinister intention while provoking the DPRK with the upcoming election as a momentum, in particular. Under this situation, no one can find fault with the DPRK's clarification of its opinion. 
					
					The group's loud talk about the "north's interference in presidential election" is a height of impudence reminding one of a thief crying "stop the thief!"
					
					They should stop at once their desperate anti-DPRK confrontation moves before vociferating about the "north's interference".
					
					The conservatives' moves of plotting against the fellow countrymen will result in pricking their own eyes.

articles.title: Action for Improving Medical System Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Improving Medical System Launched in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Doctors Association started collective actions on Nov. 19 in protest against the unpopular health policy of the puppet regime, south Korean MBC reported.
					The organization called upon doctors to join the actions for meeting the demand for improving the medical system.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Prosecutor General's Apologizing Farce Decried
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Prosecutor General's Apologizing Farce Decried
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- South Korean MBC recently accused the public prosecutor general of his recent apologizing farce.
					It said that following the detainment of an incumbent prosecutor for his irregularities and corruption, the public prosecutor general, Han Sang Dae, made a written apology on Nov. 19 in which he expressed heartfelt remorse and apology.
					
					But public reaction to it was cold, it noted. Explaining the reason for it, the radio said that it was not his first apology and, worse still, there are some other things for which the prosecution should apologize in real earnest.
					
					The prosecution has been labeled as a waiting-maid of power after the prosecution's investigation into a series of the cases that occurred under the present regime such as the case of illegal surveillance of civilians and the case of money envelop related to  the ruling party, the radio reported.
					
					Typical of them is the case of purchasing the housing lot in Naegok-dong, it said, adding there was an opinion that the public prosecutor general should be ousted with the investigation into this case as an occasion. However, he did not make a word of apology for it, the radio noted.
					
					The incumbent prosecutor was detained for his irregularities and corruption but no one of the prosecution bore the responsibility for this, it said.
					
					The public prosecutor general should make an apology for the wrongdoings not in words but in acts, the radio stressed.

articles.title: Irregularities of S. Korean Prosecution Censured
articles.content:
Irregularities of S. Korean Prosecution Censured
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The incumbent prosecutor Kim Kwang Jun of south Korea was recently detained for his irregularities and corruption.
					He was charged with receiving 900 million won from a close confidant of a swindler and Yujin Group and making speculative business of selling and buying stocks. He also helped the Jeil Savings Bank to make illegal loans and tried to remove evidence of crimes through a man of his acquaintance. It has been disclosed that he received money and other valuables from a regional construction enterprise in 2006 when he was serving at the Uijongbu District Prosecutor's Office.
					
					Upset by the criticism mounting in south Korea, the public prosecutor general released a written apology on Nov. 19 in which he talked about deep reflection and landmark reform of prosecution.
					
					There opened to the public another scandal that day.
					
					It was exposed by a woman victim that a prosecutor made a sexual assault on her in the middle of investigation.
					
					The prosecution is busy hushing up the public following the exposure of a series of irregularities and scandals of prosecutors.
					
					Such phenomena in the prosecution have reached an uncontrollable phase after the Lee Myung Bak regime emerged.
					
					It was disclosed that a prosecutor was dragged into sexual traffic after being offered a drink and at least 100 former and incumbent prosecutors were involved in bribery and sexual assaults on a regular basis in 2010 alone to be censured by the public.
					
					The former and incumbent public prosecutor generals apologized before the people for these scandals of prosecutors but they are not inferior to others in scandals.
					
					The incumbent public prosecutor general Han Sang Dae, before holding the post, committed illegal acts of changing the residence several times in order to send his children to good schools. He also dwindled, distorted and concealed all sorts of irregularities and corruption of officials, businessmen and swindlers only to spark a furor.
					
					Kim Jun Gyu. who turned over the post of the public prosecutor general to Han Sang Dae, lived in clover by pocketing a nice sum through illegal methods such as receiving as gift the bearer bond even before he became the public prosecutor general. 
					
					He squandered a fabulous amount of money. He enjoyed a luxurious life unimaginable by the ordinary people as a member of one of the highest society clubs in south Korea. 
					
					Muddy spring will have muddy streams.
					
					The corrupt prosecution is running wild to label the people desirous of independence, democracy and reunification as "criminals" and make them victims to the fascist law while crying out for "law-abiding". This is the real appearance of south Korea.

articles.title: Epizootic Disease Breaks Out in S. Korea
articles.content:
Epizootic Disease Breaks Out in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Epizootic disease hydrophobia broke out at a farmhouse in Hwasong, Kyonggi Province of south Korea on Nov. 24, south Korean KBS reported.

articles.title: Committees for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Indonesia, Finland
articles.content:
Committees for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Indonesia, Finland
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was jointly formed by the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange and the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia on November 22.
					Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education, was elected chairwoman of the remembrance committee.
					
					Meanwhile, a Finnish joint committee for remembering Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Helsinki on November 21.
					
					Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Kalevi Wahrman, chairman of the Finnish Communists' League, and Hannu Harju, former chairman of the Communist Workers' Party of Finland for the Peace and Socialism, were elected co-chairmen of the Finnish remembrance committee.
					
					The remembrance committees decided to hold political and cultural events for highly praising the immortal exploits and brilliant career of Kim Jong Il and widely introducing and disseminating them, and conduct media activities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The Rostov-Na-Donu Anti-Bourgeois Front of Russia posted on its internet website on October 21 the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Children of Revolutionary Martyrs Should Become Dependable Backbone of Songun Revolution That Gives Steady Continuity to Bloodline of Mangyongdae, Bloodline of Mt. Paektu".
					The letter, published on October 12, 2012, says the schools are Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il revolutionary schools which were founded and developed under the care of the great persons of Mt. Paektu and centers for training the backbone of the Songun revolution.
					
					It also indicates the responsibilities and duties of the revolutionary schools.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in Nepal
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Nepal Journalist Association and the Executive Committee of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics was held in Kathmandu on November 22 on the occasion of the 1st anniversary of the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The meeting discussed the issue of organizing colorful political and cultural events and widely introducing and disseminating the greatness and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il through mass media on the same occasion.
					
					The meeting adopted a joint statement which said:
					
					We praise the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il who contributed to the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					Kim Jong Il will always live in the hearts of the world progressive mankind along with his exploits as he glorified the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung as the guiding idea of the independent era and made distinguished contributions to ensuring peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world with his unique Songun politics.
					
					We will set the period from November 30 to December 17 as a remembrance period and conduct various activities praising the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Nigerian Personage Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Nigerian Personage Supports Korean People's Just Cause
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, issued a statement on November 22 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					Kim Jong Il's assumption of the top post of the KPA was a historic event of great significance in defending and glorifying socialism of the DPRK, he said.
					
					Toward the end of the last century the allied forces of imperialism became evermore desperate in their moves to stifle the DPRK with the collapse of socialism in the east European countries as a momentum. But the DPRK responded to it with thunderbolt-like declaration of proclaiming a semi-war state and quitting NPT, he noted, adding:
					
					Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism and put forward the service personnel of the KPA as the driving force of revolution, further consolidating socialism in the DPRK.
					
					Today Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un is invariably carrying forward his Songun cause.
					
					We extend firm support and solidarity to the just cause of Korean people advancing under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, while eternally holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem.

articles.title: British Personage Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
British Personage Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
						
Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, posted an article reflecting people's minds yearning for leader Kim Jong Il on an Internet homepage on November 20.
					He said in his article that he witnessed the Korean people's earnest yearnings for Kim Jong Il becoming stronger day by day when he visited the DPRK in April and September this year.
					
					He said the dear respected Kim Jong Un made sure that Kim Jong Il was held in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					Thanks to the sublime moral obligation of Kim Jong Un and the boundless reverence of the Korean people, the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were erected on Mansu Hill, he noted.
					
					He put a question why Kim Jong Il is enjoying such boundless reverence from the Korean people. 
					
					Answering the question the article continued:
					
					First, leader Kim Jong Il unswervingly defended and adhered to the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung with boundless loyalty to him and victoriously advanced the revolutionary cause of Juche true to the behests of the President.
					
					Second, he was a genuine leader of the people who shared joy and sorrow with them, always wearing a simple jumper.
					
					Third, he firmly protected the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation and the people's creative life with his invincible Songun politics and Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					Fourth, he comprehensively systematized the Juche idea with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and developing it into the great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					Therefore, the Korean people are ardently revering and yearning for him, the article said, calling on all the followers of the Juche idea and Songun idea in the world to pay deep respects to him together with the Korean people on the occasion of the first anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam apoya la justa causa del pueblo palestino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam apoya la justa causa del pueblo palestino
						
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este miercoles un mensaje de felicitacion al jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, con motivo del dia de solidaridad mundial con el pueblo palestino. 
					La misiva senala que la continua construccion de asentamientos judios y la represion racista de Israel contra los palestinos devienen obstaculo principal que impide el logro de la paz duradera e imparcial en el Medio Oriente. 
					
					Reafirma el invariable apoyo y solidaridad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con la justa causa del pueblo palestino para rescatar el legitimo derecho a la fundacion de un Estado independiente y otros derechos nacionales y desea al destinatario exitos en su trabajo responsable.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion de Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion de Mongolia
						
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El dia 28, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio en un clima amistoso con la delegacion del Ministerio de Justicia de Mongolia encabezado por el ministro Temuujin Khishigdemberel, que le hizo una visita de cortesia, en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae. 
					En la ocasion, el jefe de la delegacion senalo que en su permanencia, presencio el aspecto del pueblo coreano que logra mayores exitos en varios sectores bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre dos paises.

articles.title: Editado tomo II de "Obras Completas de Kim Jong Il"
articles.content:
Editado tomo II de "Obras Completas de Kim Jong Il"
						
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La Editora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea publico el tomo II de "Obras Completas de Kim Jong Il", ciclo de la inmortal idea Juche, la del Songun, que recoge de manera sistematica y global y por orden cronologico los trabajos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					El volumen recoge 114 obras, entre otras, discursos, discursos-resumen y charlas historicas hechos por el entre agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche y abril del 50 (1961) de la Era Juche.
					
					En las obras estan las ideas, teorias y orientaciones sobre la revolucion coreana, la construccion socialista, la reunificacion de la patria y la verificacion de independencia en todo el mundo, dilucidadas por el Dirigente con sus actividades ideo-teoricas en el primer periodo de su guia sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					En los trabajos "La Universidad Kim Il Sung es la universidad del Lider" y "Corea, te hare grande", el Dirigente aclaro la mision y tareas de ese plantel docente y expreso su firme conviccion y voluntad de continuar de generacion en generacion la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung responsabilizandose de la revolucion coreana. 
					
					"El Ejercito Popular de Corea debe levantar mas alto la consigna <!Defendamos a costa de la vida el Comite Central del Partido encabezado por el respetado camarada Kim Il Sung!>" y "La vida eterna de un revolucionario esta en la fidelidad ilimitada a su lider" y otros titulos resaltan la idea de que la defensa a ultranza del partido y el lider es la garantia de la victoria de la revolucion coreana.
					
					"Para tener correcta comprension de las tradiciones revolucionarias" y "La descripcion del lider es una tarea importante del sector de literatura y arte revolucionarias" dan cuenta de los problemas de principios para defender y mantener las tradiciones revolucionarias del Juche y se refiere a la descripcion del lider.
					
					Otros trabajos presentan la idea de formar a los estudiantes como personal competente con amplios y profundos conocimientos de su carrera y enumeran el problema de darles la capacidad para entender la realidad a traves de las actividades socio-politicas y aplicar los conocimientos aprendidos.
					
					Ademas, se puede conocer la idea de estudiar los problemas teoricos de la economia politica ateniendose a los hechos historicos y la realidad de Corea, el pensamiento del derrumbe inevitable del sistema colonial imperialista y las tareas y remedios que se presentan en la lucha antiyanqui del pueblo surcoreano.

articles.title: ACNC critica invariable politica conflictiva de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC critica invariable politica conflictiva de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En la reciente recorrida junto con el comandante de tropas yanquis ocupantes del territorio surcoreano por la zona desmilitarizada, el jefe de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de Estados Unidos "estimulo" a los uniformados norteamericanos y surcoreanos hablando de la "contribucion sostenible a la defensa del Sur de Corea".
					Tales palabras parten de la invariable politica conflictiva del imperio contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la intencion de ocupar perennemente al Sur de Corea.
					
					En la actualidad, el imperio practica mas abiertamente su politica conflictiva anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en varios dominios.
					
					En el periodo de la campana electoral, el gobernante estadounidense demando a la RPDC pagar el precio correspondiente acusandola del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo.
					
					Y otras autoridades de diplomacia y capa militar al visitar varios paises, se entregaron a la colaboracion para reprimir a la RPDC hablando de la "CVID" y de la ejecucion completa de resoluciones anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Ademas, Washington y Seul conspiran y acuerdan el provocativo proyecto para tomar la contramedida conjunta tendente a realizar la guerra anti-RPDC.
					
					Precisamente en este momento, los caudillos agresivos del imperio volvieron a revelar su ambicion de perpetuar la ocupacion de tropas yanquis en el territorio surcoreano bajo el vistoso rotulo de la "defensa del Sur de Corea" acudiendo a la zona desmilitarizada donde se enfrentan cara a cara las inmensas fuerzas armadas de ambas partes.
					
					Las tropas yanquis ocupantes del Sur de Corea sirven de efectivos agresivos y mecanismo de guerra para establecer la hegemonia en esta region al provocar la guerra agresiva anti-RPDC y controlar a las potencias.
					
					Son los tumores malignos que convirtieron la Peninsula Coreana en la zona mas candente del mundo y agravan seriamente la paz y la estabilidad del Noreste Asiatico y resto del mundo.
					
					Mientras existan las tropas yanquis en el territorio surcoreano, el imperio no tiene el derecho a hablar de que no tiene la voluntad de hostilizar a la RPDC y nadie agudizara su oido a tales palabrerias. 
					
					La realidad muestra claramente que no se ha cambiado nada la politica hostil anti-RPDC del imperio y esta se torna mas aviesa que nunca.
					
					Nunca sera justificada con nada el intento criminal del imperio que sin retirar sus tropas ocupantes del territorio surcoreano, producto de guerra fria, y recurriendose a ellas intenta intensificar mas la ocupacion y dominacion del Sur de Corea y ejecutar forzoso e ininterrumpidamente su politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					Si el imperio desea de veras la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y tiene la voluntad de abolir su politica hostil anti-RPDC debe retirar sin demora sus tropas del territorio surcoreano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza rumor de "intervencion en elecciones" por RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza rumor de "intervencion en elecciones" por RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En estos dias, la banda de los conservadores titeres del Sur de Corea difunde el rumor de la "intervencion en las elecciones presidenciales por el Norte (de Corea)".
					El diario Rodong Sinmun publico el dia 28 un comentario individual calificandolo de falsificacion infundada que burla la opinion publica.
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea no presta atencion a quien se elige como "presidente" en el Sur de Corea, senala el comentario y prosigue:
					
					Pero, la RPDC no permite el hecho de que los gobernantes surcoreanos perjudican las relaciones intercoreanas negando la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y manejan con el destino de la nacion.
					
					La RPDC presta atencion no a quien se elegira como "presidente" en las elecciones", sino a que el "nuevo presidente" tendra o no la voluntad de mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur, lo que es el derecho merecido de la RPDC siendo sujeto de relaciones N-S.
					
					A pesar de esto, la camarilla conservadora le acusa de "intervenir en elecciones presidenciales", lo cual es megalomania de los que persiguen mal objetivo.
					
					Nadie puede cuestionar a la RPDC que dice justas palabras.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben cesar su campana de confrontacion anti-RPDC antes de hablar de la "intervencion en las elecciones presidenciales" por alguien.
					
					Sera fracasada tal campana intrigante anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Japon no puede encubrir su crimen, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japon no puede encubrir su crimen, apunta Rodong Sinmun
						
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, las autoridades japonesas pronunciaron unos disparates como que faltan los hechos y pruebas de la esclavitud sexual impuesta por el viejo ejercito japones y desean que presenten esas pruebas si las hay.
					En un comentario individual difundido este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun opina que las autoridades surcoreanas niegan y justifican los crimenes del pasado porque piensan repetirlos, y continua:
					
					Tanto en virtud del derecho internacional como desde el punto de vista de la etica y moral, Japon no puede eludir de ninguna manera su responsabilidad estatal y obligacion politico- moral de indemnizar sus crimenes del pasado.
					
					Despues del fin de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, otros paises criminales de guerra pidieron disculpas en varias ocasiones reflexionando profundamente de sus crimenes y tomaron las medidas de indemnizacion por etapas a los paises danados por la guerra y a las victimas y lo hacen ahora tambien. 
					
					Japon es el unico que no reconoce siquiera su historia de agresiones y crimenes a mas de medio siglo de su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					En tal actitud grosera de los militaristas japoneses esta el intento criminal de volver a imponer a la humanidad los desastres de guerra.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben escuchar atentamente las voces de protesta y denuncia que resuenan en la palestra internacional.
					
					Si ellas siguen actuando tan descaradamente y burlando a la sociedad internacional como ahora, afrontaran las protestas y condenas mas fuertes.
